sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.services.listeners

Interface ListenerService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Nameable, com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractListenerService

    public interface ListenerService
extends Service
    An object with an operational state providing access to the underlying listener provider and manager. Listener service also has asynchronous lifecycle methods to transition between states. Listener provider and manager encapsulated by this service are only accessible while the service is running.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ListenerService.Builder
      A builder for creating listener service instances.
